%This file contains the new signal generated by MATLAB.
%Matlab will generate a long period of signal, while we may only use the first a few minutes. Since this file will be frequently updated by MATLAB.
% The format is [signal_setting_time, signal_duration, signal_flow]
% All units are meters and seconds. signal_flow: veh/hr
% Note this file is only useful when we have only one meter in the network
0,10,0
10,15,1
25,5,0
30,30,1
60,120,0
180,120,1
